content: fold it flat @knitworkz leaf use 3mm hook and green color yarn r1 6ch start from second chain from hook do single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet weave in all ends and glue on the hat tail use 3mm hook and grey color yarn note work in continuous round r1 6sc in magic_ring 6 r2 6 * increase 12 r3-4 12sc 12 r5 3 * 2sc decrease 9 r6-7 9sc 9 cut and leave a long tail to sew to the shell irt fold it flat @knitworkz assemble step 1 glue the stomach to the shirt step 2 sew the tail to the shirt on row 1 step 3 sew the ears to the hat on row 6 step 4 glue the leaf to the center of the hat on row 6 step 5 glue the eye to the hat on row 7 with 5 stitches apart step 6 use 2 ply black yarn to sew the whisker and nose @knitworkz thank you i hope you have lots of fun crocheting this you can sell your finished items if you credit knitworkz as the designer please do not reproduce sell distribute or translate my pattern © 2025 totoro labubu costume pattern inspired amigurumi pattern by @knitworkz all rights reserved @knitworkz
